fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

firecrackers.name: Firecrackers
firecrackers.description: They go bang, but not BANG! You'll still probably lose a finger or two.

m_80.name: M-80 firecracker
m_80.description: Pack of 6. Big fun and loss of appendage guarenteed!

big_red_rocket.name: Big Red Rocket
big_red_rocket.description: Shoots up to 350 feet into the air and creates a red shower of sparks.

blue_surprise.name: Blue Surpise
blue_surprise.description: Silent ascension up to 500 feet into the air with building-shaking explosion that will set off every car alarm within a 10 mile radius.

mr_gorbachev.name: Mr. Gorbachev
mr_gorbachev.description: Tears down walls, and floors, and roofs...

the_destroyer.name: The Destroyer
the_destroyer.description: Need to tunnel through the Alps? Then this is your choice.
